title: Skill Quiz
descr: Can you guess which Operator this Skill belongs to?
rules: See a random icon of a skill
Guess which operator the skill belongs too
Get a point for each correct guess
The game ends if you guessed wrong

title: Who is that Operator?
descr: How well do you know your favorite Operators? Can you guess them just by their profile?
alt: thumbnail of who is that operator game
